description: how can I assist you with the description of a book?
Example_With_Sentence: I love to read a good book before going to bed.
Example_With_Sentence_main: من دوست دارم قبل خواب کتاب بخوانم

Example_With_Sentence: I have a math class tomorrow afternoon.
Example_With_Sentence_main: فردا بعداز ظهر یک کلاس ریاضی دارم

Example_With_Sentence: My classmate helped me with the project.
Example_With_Sentence_main: هم‌کلاسی من به من در پروژه کمک کرد

Example_With_Sentence: Leonardo da Vinci is a famous artist and inventor.
Example_With_Sentence_main: لئوناردو داوینچی یک هنرمند و مخترع معروف

Example_With_Sentence: Sarah and John have been happily married for ten years
Example_With_Sentence_main: سارا و جان ده سال است که با خوشبختی ازدواج کرده‌اند
